snippet.title: The Black Pool - Early Access Launch Gameplay Trailer | Co-op Action Roguelike (2023)
snippet.description:
In the forest outside of town, four friends discover a mysterious black pool that transports them to an unknown world. To fight their way home, they must unlock and master supernatural abilities. 

The Black Pool is a 3d action rogue-like to be played solo or preferably with up to 3 of your friends. Each attempt to make it back home will take you through a gauntlet of different worlds. You will discover different elements, abilities, and upgrades. Striking visuals, an electrifying soundtrack, and high pace / skilled action will plunge you into each attempt to battle your way out.

Launching into Early Access on August 29th, 2023! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2189670/The_Black_Pool/
